_header: Of all the joys that in this world may be
Subjects: Passion, meditations on; Christ, Passion of
_description: A remembrance of the Passion — 398 lines in cross-rhymed quatrains

CULDd1189.First Lines:
Of alle þe ioyus þat in þis worlde may beþat
                    þorw wyt to man myth be ordeynd & wroute…
CULDd1189.Last Lines:
…At my deþ for ȝeue me my sinneIch be seche þe
                    my lord in trinite
CULDd1189.Attributed Title:
Þis es þe byginnyng how ich cristenman owe for to hafe a
                    remembraunce of þe passioun of oure lord ihesu criste (f.
                    179v)
CULDd1189.Editions:
Bowers,  Robert Hood. 
             Three Middle English Religious Poems.
University of Florida Monographs, Humanities
         12 Gainesville, FL, 1963: 33-43.
